1: Shout to the Lord with joy, all the earth.
2: Serve the Lord with gladness. Come before him with joyful songs.
3: Know that the Lord is God. He made us, and we are his.[a] We are his people, the sheep of his pasture.
4: Enter his gates with thanksgiving, his courtyards with praise. Give thanks to him and bless his name.[b]
5: For the Lord is good. His mercy endures forever. His faithfulness continues through all generations.
